Brand: The Burning Vengeance

Release Date: April 12, 2011

Brand, also known as the Burning Vengeance, is a powerful mage champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his fiery abilities and relentless pursuit of revenge, Brand brings destruction and chaos to the Fields of Justice. In this article, we will delve into Brand's story, his strengths and weaknesses, his background in the game, and his significant role in the League of Legends universe.

The Story of Brand

Brand's tale begins in the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land where tribes of warriors battle for dominance. Born as Kegan Rodhe, he was a member of the Ursine tribe, known for their connection to the primal forces of nature. However, Kegan's insatiable curiosity led him to explore forbidden knowledge, stumbling upon an ancient and powerful artifact known as the Burning Vengeance.

As Kegan touched the artifact, he was consumed by its fiery power, transforming him into a being of pure flame. Losing his identity and consumed by vengeance, Brand emerged from the flames, seeking retribution against those who had wronged him. He became a force of destruction, leaving a trail of scorched earth and burning bodies in his wake.

Driven by his desire for revenge, Brand set out on a quest to find those responsible for his transformation. He believed that if he could locate the other artifacts of the Burning Vengeance, he could regain his true form and unleash his wrath upon the world. With his fiery powers and relentless determination, Brand became a feared and formidable presence on the battlefield.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Brand possesses a unique set of strengths and weaknesses that make him a versatile champion in League of Legends. His primary strength lies in his ability to deal massive area-of-effect damage with his fire-based abilities. His passive ability, Blaze, allows his spells to set enemies ablaze, dealing additional damage over time.

Brand's Q ability, Sear, is a skillshot that damages and stuns the first enemy it hits. This ability is crucial for setting up his devastating combo. His W ability, Pillar of Flame, creates a fiery explosion at a target location, dealing damage to all enemies caught in the area. This ability is excellent for clearing minion waves and harassing enemies in lane.

Brand's E ability, Conflagration, allows him to spread his Blaze debuff to nearby enemies, amplifying his damage potential. This ability is particularly useful in team fights, where Brand can quickly spread his fiery wrath to multiple targets. Finally, his ultimate ability, Pyroclasm, sends out a bouncing fireball that deals massive damage to enemies it hits, making it a devastating tool in team fights.

However, Brand also has his weaknesses. He is a relatively squishy champion, meaning he can be easily burst down if caught out of position. Additionally, his abilities require precise skillshots, making him reliant on accurate aim to maximize his damage output. Brand's lack of mobility also leaves him vulnerable to champions with high mobility or crowd control abilities.

Brand's Background in the Game

Brand was released on April 12, 2011, as one of the original champions in League of Legends. Since then, he has become a popular pick for players who enjoy playing aggressive mages with high burst damage. Brand's fiery theme and visually stunning abilities make him a visually appealing champion to play.

In the game, Brand is primarily played in the mid lane or as a support. His ability to poke and harass enemies from a distance makes him a formidable laner, while his crowd control and area-of-effect damage make him a valuable asset in team fights. Brand's playstyle revolves around landing skillshots and effectively utilizing his passive to maximize his damage potential.

Throughout the years, Brand has received several skins that offer unique visual and thematic changes to the champion. These skins include Zombie Brand, Spirit Fire Brand, and Battle Boss Brand, among others. Players can access information and videos of all of Brand's skins on the dedicated page of our website, providing a comprehensive overview of the Burning Vengeance's alternate appearances.

Conclusion

Brand, the Burning Vengeance, is a fearsome mage champion in League of Legends. With his fiery abilities and relentless pursuit of revenge, he brings destruction and chaos to the Fields of Justice. Whether you enjoy incinerating your enemies with powerful area-of-effect damage or spreading your fiery wrath in team fights, Brand offers a thrilling and visually stunning gameplay experience.

As you explore the world of League of Legends, be sure to check out our website for more information and videos showcasing all of Brand's skins. Embrace the flames and unleash your burning vengeance upon your foes!

Brand (Eternal Dragon Brand)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 29, 2018

Brand, the Burning Vengeance, is a powerful mage known for his fiery abilities and destructive nature. With his skin Eternal Dragon Brand, he takes on a new form, embodying the essence of a legendary creature. This skin offers players a unique and visually stunning experience, transforming Brand into a fearsome dragon-like entity.

The Eternal Dragon Brand skin was released on November 29, 2018, and is available for purchase in the League of Legends in-game store for 1350 RP. This skin offers a complete visual overhaul for Brand, including new animations, sound effects, and spell effects, making it a must-have for fans of the champion.

Details of the Costume

As Eternal Dragon Brand, the champion undergoes a dramatic transformation, taking on the appearance of a majestic dragon. His body is covered in shimmering scales, with vibrant colors that represent the elemental power he possesses. His head is adorned with a fearsome dragon's skull, complete with glowing eyes that radiate power.

Brand's abilities are also enhanced with this skin. His fire-based spells now take on a more draconic form, with flames that resemble the breath of a dragon. The sound effects accompanying his abilities are also modified to match the theme, creating a truly immersive experience for players.

Additionally, Eternal Dragon Brand features unique recall animation, where Brand transforms into a swirling vortex of fire before reappearing in his dragon form. This animation adds an extra layer of visual appeal to the skin, making it a standout choice for players who want to make a statement on the battlefield.

The Story of Eternal Dragon Brand

The story behind Eternal Dragon Brand revolves around an ancient legend of a powerful dragon that once roamed the land, wreaking havoc and destruction wherever it went. This dragon was said to possess the ability to control fire and bend it to its will. Over time, the dragon's power grew, and it became known as the Eternal Dragon.

As the legend goes, Brand, in his quest for ultimate power, sought out the Eternal Dragon and made a pact with it. In exchange for his servitude, the dragon granted Brand immense power, transforming him into a being of pure fire and granting him control over the flames.

With his newfound power, Brand became a force to be reckoned with, leaving a trail of destruction in his wake. He embraced his role as the Burning Vengeance, seeking to bring chaos and destruction to the world. The Eternal Dragon Brand skin represents the culmination of Brand's journey, as he fully embraces the power of the dragon and becomes one with its essence.

Brand's Strengths and Weaknesses

Brand is a mage with immense burst damage potential. His abilities, when used correctly, can decimate entire teams in team fights. His passive ability, Blaze, allows his spells to deal bonus damage over time, making him a formidable threat in extended engagements.

One of Brand's greatest strengths is his ability to control the battlefield. His AoE (Area of Effect) abilities, such as Pillar of Flame and Conflagration, can hit multiple enemies at once, making him a great choice for team fights and skirmishes. Additionally, his ultimate ability, Pyroclasm, bounces between enemies, dealing massive damage and potentially turning the tide of a fight.

However, Brand also has his weaknesses. He is relatively immobile and lacks any form of escape ability, making him vulnerable to assassins and champions with high mobility. Additionally, his abilities require precise positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness, making him a champion that requires practice and skill to master.

Brand's Place in the Game

Brand has been a staple pick in the mid lane and support roles for many seasons. His high burst damage and ability to control team fights make him a valuable asset to any team composition. In the mid lane, he can dominate his lane opponent and roam to other lanes to secure kills and objectives. As a support, his ability to poke and zone enemies makes him a strong laning partner for ADCs.

Brand's versatility also allows him to be played in other roles, such as the top lane or even the jungle, although these picks are less common. His ability to deal damage over time and control the battlefield makes him a viable choice in various team compositions.

Overall, Brand is a champion that rewards players who can effectively position themselves and land skill shots. His high damage potential and ability to turn team fights in his favor make him a formidable force on the Rift.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Brand's appearances, including the Eternal Dragon Brand skin. Whether you're a fan of his fiery abilities or simply appreciate the visual spectacle of the Eternal Dragon Brand skin, this page is your go-to resource for all things Brand.

One theory is that Cryocore Brand represents an alternate universe version of the champion, where instead of harnessing the power of fire, Brand has tapped into the frigid forces of ice. In this alternate reality, Brand's fiery nature has been extinguished, replaced by a chilling cold that freezes everything in its path.

Another possibility is that Cryocore Brand is the result of a powerful spell or curse that has transformed the champion's flames into ice. Perhaps Brand stumbled upon an ancient artifact or encountered a powerful ice mage who bestowed this frozen power upon him.

Regardless of the true origins of Cryocore Brand, one thing is certain - this skin offers a visually stunning and unique experience for players who enjoy playing as Brand. Now, let's delve into the story of Brand himself. In the world of League of Legends, Brand was once a man named Kegan Rodhe, a sailor who found himself shipwrecked on the treacherous shores of the Freljord. It was there that he discovered an ancient and powerful artifact known as the Burning Vengeance.

The artifact consumed Kegan's body, transforming him into a being of pure fire and rage. Now known as Brand, he seeks to unleash his fiery wrath upon the world, burning everything in his path. Brand's ultimate goal is to find and destroy the Rune Wars, the source of all magic in the world, believing that by doing so, he can finally be free from the torment of his fiery existence.

In the game, Brand is classified as a mage and excels at dealing high amounts of area-of-effect damage. His abilities revolve around fire and burning effects, making him a formidable opponent in team fights and skirmishes. Brand's passive ability, Blaze, applies a burn effect to enemies, while his other abilities, Sear, Pillar of Flame, and Conflagration, unleash devastating fire-based attacks.

However, like all champions, Brand also has his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Additionally, Brand's abilities require precise positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness, making him a champion that requires practice and skill to master.

Despite his weaknesses, Brand has found his place in the game as a powerful mage who can turn team fights in his favor with well-placed abilities. His ability to deal massive area-of-effect damage makes him a valuable asset in team compositions that prioritize crowd control and team fighting.

If you're interested in learning more about Brand and his various appearances in the game, you can find information and videos on our dedicated page for the champion. Whether you prefer the fiery wrath of the original Brand or the icy chill of Cryocore Brand, there's no denying the power and impact that this champion brings to the world of League of Legends.

So, embrace the flames or embrace the frost - the choice is yours. Just remember, with Brand, there's always a burning vengeance waiting to be unleashed.

Brand is known for his high burst damage and area-of-effect abilities. His passive ability, Blaze, allows his abilities to deal bonus damage to enemies who are ablaze. This makes him a formidable opponent in team fights, as he can quickly melt through multiple enemies.
